alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 4:15PM EST until January 09 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central New Hanover County in southeastern North Carolina... Southeastern Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 445 PM EST. * At 415 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles south of Bald Head Island, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Kure Beach, Holden Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, Yaupon Beach, South Masonboro Island, Snows Cut, Ocean Crest Pier, North Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, St. James, Southport, Mill Creek, Myrtle Grove, Silver Lake, Sea Breeze, Long Beach, and Varnamtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina.
